EmailTemplate.name: RE: John, Carl Puckett Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (1365006832
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: John, Carl Puckett Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (1365006832.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Standard Template - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear John , I wanted to follow up on the email below from Carl Puckett and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkdcu1Nj%2BfO5MavumDnPeJmk9bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkdcu1Nj%2BfO5MavumDnPeJmk9bJ4HZ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, March 28, 2013 8:14 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: John, Carl Puckett Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners To view this email as a web page, click here <http://info.mbopartners.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57u4kW6K1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> Dear John, Hi John: Ive been using MBO for some time and thought you might be interested in their services too. Check them out when you get a second.- Carl Carl Puckett Carl Puckett has been utilizing the business services of MBO Partners <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjEyNjMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMzk4MjUmZW1haWxpZD1zY29uZGVAbWJvcGFydG5lcnMuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0zMTMxMy0xNTI5MjUzLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Carl%20Puckett&re=John&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57u4kW6K1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>, and thinks you could benefit from the program as well. My name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor, and if you have a few minutes, I invite you to learn what MBO Partners is all about and decide for yourself. 1) Who do we work with? We work with independent consultants who have an established clientele, as well as those considering venturing out to launch a new consulting business.2) Whats our mission?Its pretty simple  we make it easy for independent consultants and their clients to work together by handling the administrative, financial, legal, tax and expense burdens that bog down consultants, thus increasing their billable time. In addition, we provide them access to the largest exclusive online community of successful independent consultants, the clients that engage with them, and a multitude of valuable resources. 3) What solutions do we provide? Click here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjEyNjMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMzk4MjUmZW1haWxpZD1zY29uZGVAbWJvcGFydG5lcnMuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0zMTMxMy0xNTI5MjUzLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Carl%20Puckett&re=John&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57u4kW6K1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> to learn more about how we help independent consultants. Was Carl Puckett right about MBO Partners being a good fit for you? If so, Id love to be your resource for any of your independent consulting-related goals, and can help: · Explain our services in more detail, and more specifically how we can help you · Prepare customized bill rate and cash flow estimates to help you get the most out of your business · Provide you access to a multitude of resources catered to independent consultants and their needs Please feel free to schedule a time <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> that is convenient for you to speak with me, so I can learn more about you, describe our program in more detail, and answer any questions you may have. I look forward to chatting with you. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6028 f: 703-793-6070 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjEyNjMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMzk4MjUmZW1haWxpZD1zY29uZGVAbWJvcGFydG5lcnMuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0zMTMxMy0xNTI5MjUzLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57u4kW6K1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57u4kW6K1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D></
